Self.Wiki: Determines the display parameters to use for interface dialogue elements.

DialogGroup.Wiki: The dialogue control group this element belongs to.

DisplayTime.Wiki: The time to display this element. 0 means unlimited. In seconds.

BaseRect_left.Wiki: The x-coordinate of the base element position. Left (0) to Right (100).

BaseRect_top.Wiki: The y-coordinate of the base element position. Top (0) to Bottom (100).

BaseRect_w.Wiki: The base width of the element. None (0) to Entire Screen (100).

BaseRect_h.Wiki: The base height of the element. None (0) to Entire Screen (100).

BaseColor_r.Wiki: The red component for the RGBA color for the element.

BaseColor_g.Wiki: The green component for the RGBA color for the element.

BaseColor_b.Wiki: The blue component for the RGBA color for the element.

BaseColor_a.Wiki: The alpha component for the RGBA color for the element. Transparent (0) to Opaque (255)

FontColor_r.Wiki: The red component for the RGBA color for the text used in the element.

FontColor_g.Wiki: The green component for the RGBA color for the text used in the element.

FontColor_b.Wiki: The blue component for the RGBA color for the text used in the element.

FontColor_a.Wiki: The alpha component for the RGBA color for the text used in the element. Transparent (0) to Opaque (255)

FontScale.Wiki: The magnification to apply to the font display size.
